verses.english: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
verses.hausa: Kuma me ya sanar da kai abin da ake ce wa mai ƙwanƙwasa?

verses.english: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,
verses.hausa: Rãnar da mutãne za su kasance kamar 'ya'yan fari mãsu wãtsuwa.

verses.english: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.
verses.hausa: Kuma duwãtsu su kasance kamar gãshin sũfin da aka saɓe.

verses.english: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],
verses.hausa: To, amma wanda ma'aunansa suka yi nauyi.

verses.english: He will be in a pleasant life.
verses.hausa: To, shi yana a cikin wata rayuwa yardadda.

verses.english: But as for one whose scales are light,
verses.hausa: Kuma amma wanda ma'aunansa suka yi sauƙi (bãbu nauyi).

verses.english: His refuge will be an abyss.
And what can make you know what that is?
verses.hausa: Kuma me ya sanar da kai mece ce ita?

verses.english: It is a Fire, intensely hot.
